param.help: An image point adjacent to the boundary of the original segmentation mask is added to the segmentation mask in post-processing, if its Gaussian-smoothed intensity is sufficiently similar to the mean intensity of the mask. tool.help:
This tool permits the segmentation of cell nuclei in 2-D fluorescence microscopy images.
You can either use an individual input image (PNG, TIF) or a collection of such images.
